name: Brush Burial
description:
Brush Burial is a lo-fidelity First Person Snatcher.

You play as Fennel, a knife-wielding swamp devil with an eye for gold and a penchant for violence. Use your tail to toy with your prey: grab and fling objects, climb impossible heights, and knock your enemies off balance.

FEATURES:

  • a hand-crafted environment with multiple paths to the objective.
  • meaningful environmental interactions--grab any object you want; play with fire; use the weapons of slain enemies against their allies.
  • fluid and expressive movement.
  • raw but complex melee combat.
  • grimy visuals made from crushed hand-drawn textures.
  • an experimental inventory system where items are not lost on death, but rather when the player quits the game.
